headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
This week, get 30% off the Mammoth Thruster Jetpack.

Plus, diversify your fleet of vehicles, with an array of discounts, including:

- Declasse Scramjet – 40% off
- Invade and Persuade Tank – 40% off
- Vapid Slamtruck – 40% off
- Albany Manana Custom – 30% off

And More! Check out Rockstar Newswire for more details.
